name: As One (LeslieTheMagicStone)
description:
As One A game made for The Coding Sucks Game Jam
  • Gameplay
    • Goal: Any one player reaches the portal on the right side of the screen
    • If player A dies, player B will inherit A's special ability(to shoot or to dash)
  • Controls
    • Press Enter to reload level
    • P1 
      • use A / D to move left / right
      • press K to jump
      • press L to dash
      • (only after P2 died) press J to shoot
    • P2 
      • use left arrow / right arrow to move left / right
      • press keypad 1 to shoot
      • press keypad 2 to jump
      • (only after P1 died) press keypad 3 to dash
  • Credits
    • Campaigners for gameplay inpiration
    • Freesound.org for providing audio sources
  • Tips
    • Although it is tagged as a two-player game, a single player can complete all levels without technical difficulties.
    • If you think it's too easy, let me tell you secretly that there is a way to pass level 5 without any sacrifice. Try to find it!
